title: T.V. commercials: Shell trio
brief_description: A series of three commercials which established the “Go Well - Go Shell” theme for one year. The three commercials vary in mood and approach. Individual titles are “Theme”, “Rain” and “Coast road”.
description: A series of three commercials which established the “Go Well - Go Shell” theme for one year. The three commercials vary in mood and approach. Individual titles are “Theme”, “Rain” and “Coast road”.
